students.name: Izuku Midoriya
students.quirk_japanese: ワン・フォー・オール
students.quirk_description: A transferable Quirk that stockpiles power and grants immense strength, speed, stamina, and durability.

students.name: Katsuki Bakugo
students.quirk_description: Secretes sweat with nitroglycerin-like properties from his hands and can ignite it on command to produce powerful explosions.

students.name: Ochaco Uraraka
students.quirk_description: She can make any object weightless by touching them with the pads on her fingertips. Overuse of her Quirk will cause her to suffer from severe nausea.

students.name: Tenya Ida
students.quirk_description: Super speed and superhuman kicking strength via jet engines in his calves.

students.name: Shoto Todoroki
students.quirk_description: Enables him to generate ice from the right side of his body and fire from the left.

students.name: Eijiro Kirishima
students.quirk_description: Enables him to harden his body.

students.name: Tsuyu Asui
students.quirk_description: Gives her frog-like abilities such as enhanced swimming and jumping, sticking to and climbing up walls, and a long prehensile tongue.

students.name: Momo Yaoyorozu
students.quirk_description: Enables her the ability to create any non-biological object from the lipids stored in her body as long as she knows its molecular structure.

students.name: Minoru Mineta
students.quirk_description: He grows many small, highly adhesive grape-like balls on his head that he can remove and use as weapons. He can also use the balls as his personal trampolines, as they bounce off his body instead of sticking to him.

students.name: Denki Kaminari
students.quirk_description: Enables him the ability to absorb and emit electricity.

students.name: Kyoka Jiro
students.quirk_description: Enables her to plug her extremely long earlobes into objects to hear minuscule sounds and vibrations from her surroundings or channel the sound of her own heartbeat in the form of sonic attacks.

students.name: Fumikage Tokoyami
students.quirk_description: Enables him to manifest and control a sentient shadow monster from his body that grows more powerful in the dark.

students.name: Mina Ashido
students.quirk_description: Enables her to secrete an acidic fluid from her body.

students.name: Yuga Aoyama
students.quirk_description: Enables him to fire a laser blast from his belly button.

students.name: Mezo Shoji
students.quirk_description: Enables him to grow individual body organs at the tips of the four webbed tentacles growing from his shoulders.

students.name: Hanta Sero
students.quirk_description: Enables him to shoot cellophane tape from the tape dispenser-like organs on his elbows.

students.name: Mashirao Ojiro
students.quirk_description: Grants him a thick prehensile tail.

students.name: Koji Koda
students.quirk_description: Allows him to talk to animals.

students.name: Rikido Sato
students.quirk_description: Enhances his physical strength at the cost of his cognitive functions whenever he consumes sugar.

students.name: Toru Hagakure
students.quirk_description: Makes her entire body invisible and gives her the ability to refract light.

students.name: Neito Monoma
students.quirk_description: Allows him to temporarily duplicate and use another person's Quirk by simply touching them. He can store four Quirks, but can only activate one at a time.

students.name: Itsuka Kendo
students.quirk_description: Enables her to enlarge her fists.

students.name: Ibara Shiozaki
students.quirk_description: Gives her a head of vines instead of hair that she can extend and use in combat.

students.name: Tetsutetsu Tetsutetsu
students.quirk_description: Gives him the ability to turn his skin to steel.

students.name: Juzo Honenuki
students.quirk_description: Enables him to soften anything that he touches.

students.name: Nirengeki Shoda
students.quirk_description: At the site of an initial impact he can create a second impact, which he can activate anytime.

students.name: Yosetsu Awase
students.quirk_description: Allows him to physically connect anything he touches.

students.name: Kosei Tsuburaba
students.quirk_description: Enables him to solidify air into a wall or platform.

students.name: Sen Kaibara
students.quirk_description: Allows him to rotate any part of his body at incredibly high speeds, similarly to a drill.

students.name: Kojiro Bondo
students.quirk_description: Enables him to excrete a glue-like liquid from seven eyeholes on his glue dispenser-shaped head.

students.name: Reiko Yanagi
students.quirk_description: Grants her the ability to telekinetically manipulate objects around her.

students.name: Jurota Shishida
students.quirk_description: Grants him the ability to transform into a monstrous beast.

students.name: Yui Kodai
students.quirk_description: Enables her to change the size of any object she interacts with.

students.name: Hiryu Rin
students.quirk_description: Enables him to form scales on his body for combat and other purposes. He can also shoot the scales.

students.name: Kinoko Komori
students.quirk_description: Grants her the ability to create spores from her cells, allowing her to grow mushrooms from the surfaces of her surroundings.

students.name: Togaru Kamakiri
students.quirk_description: Grants him the ability to produce large, sharp blades from all over his body.

students.name: Pony Tsunotori
students.quirk_description: Allows her to grow effectively gazelle-like horns on her head and control them.

students.name: Setsuna Tokage
students.quirk_description: Allows her to split her body into several pieces and control them telekinetically.

students.name: Shihai Kuroiro
students.quirk_description: Grants him the ability to merge into anything that is black-colored and control it.

students.name: Manga Fukidashi
students.quirk_description: Allows him to manifest different onomatopoeias into reality in the form of katakana.

students.name: Mei Hatsume
students.quirk_description: Allows her to zoom her vision to up to 5 kilometers.

students.name: Hitoshi Shinso
students.quirk_description: Allows him to control those who answer his questions.
students.class: Origionally - General Course. Transfered to - Hero Course

students.name: Mirio Togata
students.quirk_description: Allows him to phase his body through anything solid, including the ground itself.

students.name: Tamaki Amajiki
students.quirk_description: Gives him the characteristics and abilities of anything he eats.

students.name: Nejire Hado
students.quirk_description: Allows her to convert her stamina into energy and release it in the form of spiral shockwaves.
